system.requirements:
Tier 1; Intelligence 40, Fellowship 30
Aptitudes: Intelligence, Social, Tzeentch
system.effect:
Character can derive basic meaning from languages they do not know, can also make Untrained Linguistics Skill Tests as if it were a non-specialist skill. (They can make the test, but at -20)
If Rogue Trader or Earlier, can treat unknown languages as Untrained Basic Skills with -10 instead.
In a Social Encounter, gain +20 to Opposed Tests when going against an opponent speaking in a different language.
